content.text: [W]Use this form to ask the tribunal to postpone a hearing to a later date.

items: [W]which hearing you want to postpone. If the hearing you want to postpone is listed over multiple days, tell us which day or days you are applying to postpone
[W]the reason you want to postpone. The tribunal will use this to decide whether to grant your application
[W]any essential documents to support your application
[W]weekday dates within the next 3 months that you, your witnesses or representatives cannot attend a rescheduled hearing
[W]the reason you cannot attend on those dates
